post:
Hi Guys and girls.

So we have a dedi with Dacentec that has reached and passed its RTO time line and is currently under the colo plan.

I no longer need this dedi and wish to cancel but it really isnt worth the shipping costs. So was wondering if anyone based in the area is wanting pick it up.

    Pick Up Address:
    Dacentec
    801 Main St. N.W.
    Lenoir, N.C. 28645

    Server Specs:
    Model: HP Proliant (1U)
    CPU: 2XL5420
    RAM: 16GB
    Drives: 4 x 146GB SAS


So anyone in the area that wants the server for free, let me know. (send me a PM, first come first served) 

You will need to have an account registered with dacentec for the transfer of ownership. 

Note: to de-rack the server dacentec does charge $50 fee IIRC
